thread.title: High-Rise Building Fire in Odessa Caused by Downed Drone – Russian Shelling of Ukraine
thread.title_full: High-Rise Building Fire in Odessa Caused by Downed Drone – Russian Shelling of Ukraine

author: world today news
title: High-Rise Building Fire in Odessa Caused by Downed Drone – Russian Shelling of Ukraine
text:
“A high-rise building in Odessa was damaged by the debris of a downed drone. A fire broke out. Specialists are working. Data on the victims is being clarified,” the message says.
Also hit and fire
confirmed in the Defense Forces of the South of Ukraine.
“As a result of falling debris from a downed kamikaze drone, which the enemy sent through residential areas of Odessa, a fire broke out in a high-rise building.
Information about the scale of destruction and casualties is being clarified. The relevant services are working at the risk of their lives to save people,” the message says.
Russian shelling of Ukraine
Let us remind you that on the evening of Thursday, December 28, Russian invaders once again attack Ukraine with Shahed-type drones in the south and east of the country.
The Russians also shelled eight communities in the Sumy region, and there was a wounded woman.
Read urgent and important messages about
Russia’s war against Ukraine on the channel RBC-Ukraine on Telegram.
2023-12-28 21:51:34
#Shelling #Odessa #kamikaze #drone #hit #residential #building
